creator: Audio Editing & Tools
descriptionHtml:
This Audio editor application is going to be your every day's audio editing app.

All tools
- Audio mixer and editor with multiple layers
- Custom drum pad creator
- Video from a music and photo. Slide show creator
- Simple voice recorder
- Audio cutter and ringtone maker
- Audio tempo and pitch changer
- Audio converter and extractor
- Volume changer, Fade in & fade out maker

-Professional Audio Maker & Music mixer with multiple layers
With the professional audio editor & mixer with layers you can add unlimited tracks, position them with the timeline. Very easy to use and beautiful UI.
Loop audios. Change audio volume, change music speed and pitch.
App keeps projects for your editing, so you can get back to your work at any time.

-DJ drum pad creator
Create your own drum pad with your music and beats.
Choose audio from your device or record your voice.
Endlessly loop audio or make it play while holding to create a piano effect. Tune every button to get the best sound.

-Ready made drum pad packages
Use our beautiful drum pad packages to create music

-Simple voice recorder
Record voice with high quality.
Record in background.
Recorder supports mp3 and wav formats, many samples rates, MONO and STEREO channels.

-Music on photo & slideshow
Create video from music and photo, Add text on image. You can set video orientation, scale and size.

-Audio cutter and ringtone maker
Cut your music, cut any audio with an easy UI and handy cutter tools.
You can use the cut result as ringtone, alarm, notification tone or a music song.

-Change audio speed, tempo and pitch  
Audio Speed Changer allows you to change the tempo of audio files on your device without affecting the pitch (time stretch), or change the pitch without changing the tempo / speed (pitch shift).

-Audio converter
Audio Converter gives you ability to convert any audio format to another format including MP3, AAC, M4A, OGG, WMA, WAV
Support many audio bitrates. Change audio frequency. MONO and STEREO channels

-Music volume changer, volume booster and fade maker
With audio volume changer tool, you can increase a music volume up to 5 times and make it higher, or lower. Fade in and fade out maker.

-Export audio
Export your projects and music in mp3, Ogg, wav, aac, WMA, m4a audio formats or .mp4 video files and share with your friends! Create slideshows from your music and images.


App supports many audio formats: MP3, AAC, M4A, OGG, WAV, FLAC, WMA, etc.
Supports many audio bitrates 128 kb/s, 160 kb/s, 192 kb/s etc.
Bitrate formats VBR, ABR, CBR
Change audio frequency/ sample rate to 22050 Hz, 44100 Hz, 48000 Hz etc
Support MONO and STEREO channels

For what you can use the app
-Loop audios
-Split audio and music
-Merge and join multiple audios
-Record multiple voices and mix
-Create LaunchPad
-Drum Pad looper and create beats
-Play music as a DJ, create DJ mix
-Make beats and music
-Different Audio tools
descriptionShort: Create custom DrumPad and play your DJ loops. Easy audio cutter. Beatbox maker.

Avet Avetisyan 2, suite 31 Yerevan 0033 Armenia

https://sites.google.com/view/zazaapps/home

All tools
- Audio mixer and editor with multiple layers
- Custom drum pad creator
- Video from a music and photo. Slide show creator
- Simple voice recorder
- Audio cutter and ringtone maker
- Audio tempo and pitch changer
- Audio converter and extractor

-Professional Audio Maker & Music mixer with multiple layers
With the professional audio editor & mixer with layers you can add unlimited tracks, position them with the timeline. Very easy to use and beautiful UI.
Loop audios. Change audio volume, change music speed and pitch.
App keeps projects for your editing, so you can get back to your work at any time.

-DJ drum pad creator
Create your own drum pad with your music and beats.
Choose audio from your device or record your voice.
Endlessly loop audio or make it play while holding to create a piano effect. Tune every button to get the best sound.

-Ready made drum pad packages
Use our beautiful drum pad packages to create music

-Simple voice recorder
Record voice with high quality.
Record in background.
Recorder supports mp3 and wav formats, many samples rates, MONO and STEREO channels.

-Music on photo & slideshow
Create video from music and photo, Add text on image. You can set video orientation, scale and size.

-Audio cutter and ringtone maker
Cut your music, cut any audio with an easy UI and handy cutter tools.
You can use the cut result as ringtone, alarm, notification tone or a music song.

-Change audio speed, tempo and pitch  
Audio Speed Changer allows you to change the tempo of audio files on your device without affecting the pitch (time stretch), or change the pitch without changing the tempo / speed (pitch shift).

-Audio converter
Audio Converter gives you ability to convert any audio format to another format including MP3, AAC, M4A, OGG, WMA, WAV
Support many audio bitrates. Change audio frequency. MONO and STEREO channels

-Music volume changer, volume booster and fade maker
With audio volume changer tool, you can increase a music volume up to 5 times and make it higher, or lower. Fade in and fade out maker.

-Export audio

Supports many audio bitrates 128 kb/s, 160 kb/s, 192 kb/s etc.
Bitrate formats VBR, ABR, CBR
Change audio frequency/ sample rate to 22050 Hz, 44100 Hz, 48000 Hz etc
Support MONO and STEREO channels

creator: Audio Editing & Tools
descriptionHtml:
Thank you for your attention on this app and thank you for your time. Feel free to give us your rate, because every opinion is important for us.

AWESOME FEATURES
- Audio Mixer ( multiple musics jam, multiple tracks )
- Audio editor
- Audio trimmer ( Cut music )
- Custom drum pad ( My drum pad )
- Launch pad
- Ready drum pad packages
- Audio looper
- Music on image ( Video from music and image )
- Simple voice recorder ( Dictaphone recorder )
- Audio pitch changer ( pitch editor )
- Audio tempo changer ( music speed editor )
- Audio volume changer ( volume booster, audio fader)
- Audio exporter
- Audio format converter ( wav converter, mp3 to wav, wav to mp3 )

HELPER TOOLS
- Timeline for better result
- Autosaving for Audio mixer and editor projects
- Multitrack player ( Player with multiple audios )
- Zoom In and Zoom out the tracks with two fingers
- Smart and easy to use audio chooser

AUDIO MAKER & MUSIC MIXER, MULTIPLE TRACKS
In professional audio editor & mixer with layers you can add unlimited tracks, Merge music or make music jam, drag tracks left and right on timeline. Very easy to use and beautiful UI. Join music together. You can use it as a Music looper. All-in-one audio editing tools for every track. Loop audio to make it longer, trim audio and boost music volume. Use fade music volume for better passes from track to track. Trim music for better fit. You can create beat, create music or create loop. Repeat music as much as you want.
App keeps projects for your editing, so you can get back to your work at any time.

CUSTOM DRUM PAD & BEAT LOOPER
Create my drum pad with my music and beats. Choose audio from your device or record your voice. Make audio endless loop or make it play while holding to create a piano effect. Tune every button to get the best sound. Make beatbox and loop beat. Use custom drum pad for beat making.

READY-MADE DRUMPAD PACKAGES
Use our beautiful drum pad packages to create music

SIMPLE VOICE RECORDER
With High quality voice recorder you can record voice in background, you can record mp3 or record wav. Record voice in different sample rates, MONO or STEREO channels.

-MUSIC ON PHOTO & MAKE SLIDESHOW
With slideshow maker you can create video from photo, add music on image, add text on image. Create slideshow with your preferred video settings. You can make landscape video or portrait video, set the video scale and size.

TRIM AUDIO AND MAKE RINGTONE
With the music cutter you can cut audio with an easy and handy UI cutter tools. This music trimmer will show you every information you need for best result. Zoom track for excellent audio cutting. Trim music and use it for device ringtone .

AUDIO SPEED CHANGER
With audio tempo editor and music tempo changer you can change audio tempo without affecting the pitch (time stretch), or with music pitch changer you can change audio pitch without changing the tempo.

AUDIO FORMAT CONVERTER
Music format Converter gives you ability to convert any audio format to another format Convert mp3 to wav, or convert wav to mp3, convert mp3 to AAC. Supported audio formats MP3, AAC, M4A, OGG, WMA, WAV
Change audio bitrates. Change audio frequency. Change audio channel mono to stereo or change stereo to mono.

MUSIC VOLUME BOOSTER & AUDIO VOLUME FADER
With audio volume booster tool, you can increase music volume up to 5 times. Or you can decrease audio volume. Use fade volume for music to make fluent mixies.

AUDIO EXPORTER
Export your projects and music in MP3, OGG, WAV, AAC, WMA, M4A audio formats or .mp4 video files and share with your friends! Create slideshows from your music and images.

WRAPUP
We believe that everyone can be a music creator and you can use this application as a
- Any audio merger
- Music jam maker
- Music merger
- Slideshow creator
- Voice recorder & music recorder
- Drum pad creator
- Loop maker and beat creator
- DJ mix creator
- Audio format converter
- Music fader
- Music volume booster

With the best regards!
descriptionShort: Create drum pad . Beat looper & create slideshow . Beatbox maker & Repeat music

descriptionHtml:
Thank you for your attention on this app and thank you for your time. Feel free to give us your rate, because every opinion is important for us.

AWESOME FEATURES
- Audio Mixer ( multiple musics jam, multiple tracks )
- Audio editor
- Audio trimmer ( Cut music )
- Custom drum pad ( My drum pad )
- Launch pad
- Ready drum pad packages
- Audio looper
- Music on image ( Video from music and image )
- Simple voice recorder ( Dictaphone recorder )
- Audio pitch changer ( pitch editor )
- Audio tempo changer ( music speed editor )
- Audio volume changer ( volume booster, audio fader)
- Audio exporter
- Audio format converter ( wav converter, mp3 to wav, wav to mp3 )
- Beat creator

HELPER TOOLS
- Timeline for better result
- Autosaving for Audio mixer and editor projects
- Multitrack player ( Player with multiple audios )
- Zoom In and Zoom out the tracks with two fingers
- Smart and easy to use audio chooser

AUDIO MAKER & MUSIC MIXER, MULTIPLE TRACKS
In professional audio editor & mixer with layers you can add unlimited tracks, Merge music or make music jam, drag tracks left and right on timeline. Very easy to use and beautiful UI. Join music together. You can use it as a Music looper. All-in-one audio editing tools for every track. Loop audio to make it longer, trim audio and boost music volume. Use fade music volume for better passes from track to track. Trim music for better fit. You can create beat, create music or create loop. Repeat music as much as you want.
App keeps projects for your editing, so you can get back to your work at any time.

CUSTOM DRUM PAD & BEAT LOOPER
Create my drum pad with my music and beats. Choose audio from your device or record your voice. Make audio endless loop or make it play while holding to create a piano effect. Tune every button to get the best sound. Make beatbox and loop beat. Use custom drum pad for beat making.

READY-MADE DRUMPAD PACKAGES
Use our beautiful drum pad packages to create music

SIMPLE VOICE RECORDER
With High quality voice recorder you can record voice in background, you can record mp3 or record wav. Record voice in different sample rates, MONO or STEREO channels.

-MUSIC ON PHOTO & MAKE SLIDESHOW
With slideshow maker you can create video from photo, add music on image, add text on image. Create slideshow with your preferred video settings. You can make landscape video or portrait video, set the video scale and size.

TRIM AUDIO AND MAKE RINGTONE
With the music cutter you can cut audio with an easy and handy UI cutter tools. This music trimmer will show you every information you need for best result. Zoom track for excellent audio cutting. Trim music and use it for device ringtone .

AUDIO SPEED CHANGER
With audio tempo editor and music tempo changer you can change audio tempo without affecting the pitch (time stretch), or with music pitch changer you can change audio pitch without changing the tempo.

AUDIO FORMAT CONVERTER
Music format Converter gives you ability to convert any audio format to another format Convert mp3 to wav, or convert wav to mp3, convert mp3 to AAC. Supported audio formats MP3, AAC, M4A, OGG, WMA, WAV
Change audio bitrates. Change audio frequency. Change audio channel mono to stereo or change stereo to mono.

MUSIC VOLUME BOOSTER & AUDIO VOLUME FADER
With audio volume booster tool, you can increase music volume up to 5 times. Or you can decrease audio volume. Use fade volume for music to make fluent mixies.

AUDIO EXPORTER
Export your projects and music in MP3, OGG, WAV, AAC, WMA, M4A audio formats or .mp4 video files and share with your friends! Create slideshows from your music and images.

WRAPUP
We believe that everyone can be a music creator and you can use this application as a
- Any audio merger
- Music jam maker
- Music merger
- Slideshow creator
- Voice recorder & music recorder
- Drum pad creator
- Loop maker and beat creator
- DJ mix creator
- Audio format converter
- Music fader
- Music volume booster

With the best regards!

creator: Audio Editing & Tools
descriptionHtml:
Thank you for your attention on this app and thank you for your time. Feel free to give us your rate, because every opinion is important for us.

AWESOME FEATURES
- Audio Mixer ( multiple musics jam, multiple tracks )
- Audio editor
- Audio trimmer ( Cut music )
- Custom drum pad ( My drum pad )
- Launch pad
- Ready drum pad packages
- Audio looper
- Music on image ( Video from music and image )
- Simple voice recorder ( Dictaphone recorder )
- Audio pitch changer ( pitch editor )
- Audio tempo changer ( music speed editor )
- Audio volume changer ( volume booster, audio fader)
- Audio exporter
- Audio format converter ( wav converter, mp3 to wav, wav to mp3 )
- Beat creator

HELPER TOOLS
- Timeline for better result
- Autosaving for Audio mixer and editor projects
- Multitrack player ( Player with multiple audios )
- Zoom In and Zoom out the tracks with two fingers
- Smart and easy to use audio chooser

AUDIO MAKER & MUSIC MIXER, MULTIPLE TRACKS
In professional audio editor & mixer with layers you can add unlimited tracks, Merge music or make music jam, drag tracks left and right on timeline. Very easy to use and beautiful UI. Join music together. You can use it as a Music looper. All-in-one audio editing tools for every track. Loop audio to make it longer, trim audio and boost music volume. Use fade music volume for better passes from track to track. Trim music for better fit. You can create beat, create music or create loop. Repeat music as much as you want.
App keeps projects for your editing, so you can get back to your work at any time.

CUSTOM DRUM PAD & BEAT LOOPER
Create my drum pad with my music and beats. Choose audio from your device or record your voice. Make audio endless loop or make it play while holding to create a piano effect. Tune every button to get the best sound. Make beatbox and loop beat. Use custom drum pad for beat making.

READY-MADE DRUMPAD PACKAGES
Use our beautiful drum pad packages to create music

SIMPLE VOICE RECORDER
With High quality voice recorder you can record voice in background, you can record mp3 or record wav. Record voice in different sample rates, MONO or STEREO channels.

-MUSIC ON PHOTO & MAKE SLIDESHOW
With slideshow maker you can create video from photo, add music on image, add text on image. Create slideshow with your preferred video settings. You can make landscape video or portrait video, set the video scale and size.

TRIM AUDIO AND MAKE RINGTONE
With the music cutter you can cut audio with an easy and handy UI cutter tools. This music trimmer will show you every information you need for best result. Zoom track for excellent audio cutting. Trim music and use it for device ringtone .

AUDIO SPEED CHANGER
With audio tempo editor and music tempo changer you can change audio tempo without affecting the pitch (time stretch), or with music pitch changer you can change audio pitch without changing the tempo.

AUDIO FORMAT CONVERTER
Music format Converter gives you ability to convert any audio format to another format Convert mp3 to wav, or convert wav to mp3, convert mp3 to AAC. Supported audio formats MP3, AAC, M4A, OGG, WMA, WAV
Change audio bitrates. Change audio frequency. Change audio channel mono to stereo or change stereo to mono.

MUSIC VOLUME BOOSTER & AUDIO VOLUME FADER
With audio volume booster tool, you can increase music volume up to 5 times. Or you can decrease audio volume. Use fade volume for music to make fluent mixies.

AUDIO EXPORTER
Export your projects and music in MP3, OGG, WAV, AAC, WMA, M4A audio formats or .mp4 video files and share with your friends! Create slideshows from your music and images.

WRAPUP
We believe that everyone can be a music creator and you can use this application as a
- Any audio merger
- Music jam maker
- Music merger
- Slideshow creator
- Voice recorder & music recorder
- Drum pad creator
- Loop maker and beat creator
- DJ mix creator
- Audio format converter
- Music fader
- Music volume booster

With the best regards!

creator: Audio Editing & Tools
descriptionHtml:
This multitrack audio mixer will be your all-in-one music maker studio in your pocket. It has all the tools you need.
Create ringtones, easy start, make your music!

FEATURES

Multitrack Music editor
-Add unlimited tracks and audios
-Merge music or make music jam, combine multiple audios.
-Very easy to use and beautiful UI
-Split audio to multiple parts
-Autosaving projects

Easy to use Audio editor
-Cut audio
-Audio effects (Echo, Chorus, Delay, Reverb, Bass, Tremolo, Vibrato, Flanger,
Phaser, Tempo and pitch, )
-Audio cutter and music trimmer

Trim audio and make ringtone
-Music cutter
-Cut audio with an easy and handy UI cutter tools.
-Music trimmer will show you milliseconds you need for best result.
-Zoom track for excellent audio cutting

CUSTOM DRUM PAD & BEAT LOOPER
-Create drum pad with your music and beats.
-Choose audio from your device or record your voice.
-Make audio endless loop or make it play while holding
-Tune every button to get the best sound.
-Make beatbox and loop beat.

READY-MADE DRUMPAD PACKAGES
Use our beautiful drum pad packages to create music

SIMPLE VOICE RECORDER
-High quality voice recorder
-Record voice in background
-Record mp3 or record wav.
-Record in different sample rates, MONO or STEREO channels.

MUSIC ON PHOTO & MAKE SLIDESHOW
-Slideshow maker with music
-Create video from photo,
-Add music on image, add text on image.

Convert audio and export
-Export your projects and music
-MP3, OGG, WAV, AAC, WMA, M4A audio formats or .mp4 video files

Audio speed changer
-Audio tempo editor and music tempo changer
-Change audio tempo without affecting the pitch (time stretch)
-Music pitch changer

Music volume booster & audio volume fader
-Audio volume booster tool
-Increase music volume up to 5 times.
-Decrease audio volume
-Audio Fade In and Fade out

Video to Audio
-Convert video to audio and combine thm

Equalizer
-Change different bands of audio and music

HELPER TOOLS
- Timeline for better result
- Autosaving for Multiline Music editor and mixer projects
- Multitrack player ( Player with multiple audios )
- Zoom In and Zoom out the tracks with two fingers
- Smart and easy to use audio chooser

Contact us for suggestions.
With the best regards!

descriptionHtml:
VoxBox: Your Go-To Multitrack Audio Editor, Music Maker, and Voice Editing Powerhouse to

VoxBox redefines the landscape of audio editing and music creation, seamlessly integrating a voice changer, ringtone maker, music mixer, and beat maker into a singular, cutting-edge platform. Elevate voice recordings with our bass booster, volume booster, and precise equalizer, making VoxBox your go-to for every audio editor and music maker need.

Multi-track Audio Editor & Sound Editor: Dive into audio editing with tools like audio cutter, music cutter, and mp3 cutter. VoxBox is the definitive professional audio editor, perfect for both music editor and song editor roles.

Voice Changer & Voice Recorder: Transform and capture voices with unmatched clarity. Ideal for versatile projects, VoxBox offers tools to change voice, ensuring every voice recording is crystal clear.

Music Maker & Beat Maker: Craft captivating beats and melodies. As both a music editor and song maker, VoxBox supports your musical journey from inception to completion.

Audio Converter & Video to MP3: Simplify audio conversion, extract audio from video, or transition mp4 to mp3 with ease. VoxBox excels in media converter tasks, accommodating various format converter requirements.

Audio Mixer & Audio Booster: Master the mix and elevate your audio. VoxBox is key for achieving louder volume and clear audio, featuring audio trimmer and audio joiner for meticulous edits.

Special Features: Explore reverse audio, use the pitch changer, and adjust with audio speed changer. VoxBox offers a unique suite for remix music and music mashup maker projects.

Creative Tools: Employ music looper, loop audio, and loop music functions for endless playback. With noise reduction, easily remove background noise, and apply voice echo for rich soundscapes.

Advanced Editing: Leverage audio compressor, music trimmer, and song cutter for complex edits. VoxBox's sound loop and speed changer tools enhance audio editing, making it an all-encompassing audio lab and music lab.

VoxBox goes beyond conventional audio editing, merging music editor, song mixer, audio maker, and sound maker features into an intuitive interface. Edit music, cut music, mix music, and make songs with ease. From being a versatile recording app to a comprehensive audio player, VoxBox is the ultimate toolkit for audio editing, echoing the precision of Audacity with innovative flair.

Expand your audio editing capabilities with VoxBox—where audio lab explorations lead to groundbreaking discoveries, and each music lab session sculpts the sounds of the future. Convert video to audio, amplify volume, and unlock endless audio making possibilities. VoxBox: Synthesizing sound with innovation.

With VoxBox, engage in audio editing like never before. Utilize mp3 converter, audio converter, video to mp3 for seamless conversions. Make music, create beats, and edit songs with a music editor that turns ideas into realities. VoxBox's beatbox and audio mixer functionalities encourage creative compositions, while music cutter, mp3 cutter, and audio cutter tools refine and define the precision of your projects.

VoxBox is not just an audio player; it's a music player that elevates listening and creating experiences. As a ringtone maker, it personalizes your device, and with bass booster and volume booster, it ensures every note is heard. Equalizer settings tailor sounds, while audio booster intensifies without distortion.

Voice editor, sound editor, video sound editor—VoxBox wears many hats, all designed to enhance and perfect your audio projects. Whether you're recording app sessions, voice recording for podcasts, or mixing music for an album, VoxBox provides the tools for success. Convert video to audio, boost volume, and edit music with a platform where innovation meets sound. VoxBox: Revolutionizing audio editing and music creation.
